nodes.text: Drall was a pleasant, temperate planet in the Corellian system, being one of the Five Brothers. It was the homeworld of the Drall, and was famous for its great food and the Boiling Sea.

It was believed that the Celestials actually moved the planet into Corell's orbit from an unknown location, along with its four brother planets, facilitated by subterranean planetary repulsors and Centerpoint Station.
Over 35,000 years before the Battle of Yavin, Drall scientist Tiran developed the Theory of Universal Reference.
About 30,000 BBY, the planet was annexed by the Infinite Empire.
In 500 BBY, Drall joined with Corellia and Selonia in a failed attempt to conquer Talus and Tralus.
During the Corellian Crisis, the Drallist faction assumed power on Drall. It was later blockaded during the Second Galactic Civil War.
